alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:31PM CDT until July 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dermott, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mcmillan Corner around 625 PM CDT. Lake Village around 630 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
